creator: Grasper Global (Skillmatics)
descriptionHtml:
Found It! is a fun educational game for kids of all ages - Learn about places and things around you in the most exciting way possible!

Found It! offers children 8+ unique themes, all in one app, in the most exciting scavenger hunt yet!

Found It! is a global bestseller with over 3,000 great reviews on Amazon. We are thrilled to launch the digital version of Found It!. Families can now get instant access to new decks at lower prices, access enhanced gameplay modes and enjoy the flexibility to play anytime, anywhere! The app comes with 8+ unique location-based themes including At Home, On the Go, At the Beach, and more - each containing 30 game cards that are filled to the brim with smart clues, compelling questions and gorgeous artworks. It is the perfect way for children to build skills and expand their general knowledge whether it’s playing with a parent or against each other!

SCAVENGER HUNT - Found it! is an exciting game that helps children learn as they go on the most exciting ‘Search & Find’ with prompts like Can you find.."Something with a pattern? Something smaller than your palm?” etc.! Players must shout "FOUND IT!" as soon as they get their hands on the object! The first one to win 7 cards wins the game!

FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY - Get your family off their devices and ready for a super fun time at home with this card game. Found It Indoor Edition can be played at home, at school and even on a playdate!

HUNDREDS OF FUN CARDS - Found It! includes over 240+ unique cards that are spread across 8+ game sets such as At Home, On the Go, At the Beach, and much more! Each set will have you thinking and scavenging your way to winning while you learn about an array of topics that will turn you into a human encyclopedia!

BUILDS CRITICAL SKILLS - Found It!’s age appropriate content and gameplay focuses on building key skills in young learners such as Communication, Decision Making, Problem Solving and Creative Thinking!

ENGAGING & EDUCATIONAL GAME - This super fun game keeps kids engaged for hours and boosts their observation & logical reasoning skills. Perfect for boys and girls ages 4 to 7, this game can be played in 2 fun ways!

KEY LEARNING OUTCOMES - Phonological Awareness, Measurements & Opposites, Numbers and Counting, Color Recognition and Mixing, Our Body & Health, Shapes & Spatial Relationships, Self-Awareness & Emotions

Visit the Skillmatics website today to discover more games!
https://skillmaticsworld.com
